short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Browser Extension That Manages Your Business Expenses

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save money on your business expenses right from your browser.

Download BlueBean, the all in one procure to pay solution delivered as a browser extension.
 
Add BlueBean to your browser in seconds and buy the way you always do. We’ll pop up with savings for you. 
 
Get great discounts on 600+ and growing B2B websites
Without any effort from your side, BlueBean will automatically offer digital coupons and promo codes it finds while you browse. We are your procurement team, technology and processes, all in one.
 
Want more savings and automate your entire procure to pay process? Create an account on bluebean.ai to buy like a pro.
 
----------------------------------------------  
 
*Based on an aggregate of 2,525 coupons available on BlueBean at January 16th 2024.  
 
By using the BlueBean browser extension, you agree to BlueBean’s terms of services. (https://bluebean.ai/legal )  
 
Disclaimer:  
This extension uses Google Analytics to collect extension usage statistics to help improve user experience. If you want to opt-out of Google Analytics tracking, please visit http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout or you can set up a filter in Adblock Plus or similar ad blocker tools like AdBlock, uBlock or Adblock Pro.
